sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    E.EMPLOYEE_ID ,
    E.FIRST_NAME ,
    E.LAST_NAME ,
    E.EMAIL ,
    E.PHONE_NUMBER ,
    E.HIRE_DATE ,
    E.JOB_ID ,
    E.SALARY ,
    E.COMMISSION_PCT ,	
    D.DEPARTMENT_ID,
    D.DEPARTMENT_NAME ,
    D.MANAGER_ID,	
    D.LOCATION_ID
FROM dbo.Employee_Info E 
FULL JOIN dbo.Department D 
    ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID
